scripts.start: NODE_CONFIG_DIR='src/config' NODE_ENV='development' nodemon --watch '**/*.ts' --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.start_prod: NODE_CONFIG_DIR='src/config' NODE_ENV='production' nodemon --watch '**/*.js' --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register dist/out-tsc/index.js
